author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Gene One Life Science to issue 3rd series convertible bonds worth 12 bln won
text:
April 10 (Reuters) - Gene One Life Science Inc :
* Says it will issue 3rd series unregistered and unsecured private convertible bonds, to raise 12 billion won in proceeds for operations
* Maturity date is Oct. 12, 2022, coupon rate is 2 percent and yield to maturity is 4 percent for the bonds
* Conversion price is 6,953 won/share and conversion ratio is 100 percent
Source text in Korean: goo.gl/L1J8pQ
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
